Central London Reef
East London Reef
West London Reef
Cuarteron Reef

The London Reefs are located between 8°49′N 112°12′E﻿ / ﻿8.82°N 112.2°E﻿ / 8.82; 112.2 and 8°56′N 112°52′E﻿ / ﻿8.94°N 112.86°E﻿ / 8.94; 112.86 (8°49′N 112°12′E﻿ / ﻿8.82°N 112.2°E﻿ / 8.82; 112.2 and 8°56′N 112°52′E﻿ / ﻿8.94°N 112.86°E﻿ / 8.94; 112.86) in the Spratly Islands of the South China Sea.Coordinates: 8°50′N 112°30′E﻿ / ﻿8.833°N 112.500°E﻿ / 8.833; 112.500

The four major features within the area (East London Reef, West London Reef, Central London Reef and Cuarteron Reef), are known by many names:[1][2][3]
